title: Mini-Ep 185: Easier Said Than Done
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 185: Easier Said Than Done
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree note their Quarantine anniversary, and listeners weigh in about the caller with a smelly partner, having a skincare routine when you work a night shift, and the best work from home desk set-up.Activity of the Week: What’s bringing you...
description:
Kate and Doree note their Quarantine anniversary, and listeners weigh in about the caller with a smelly partner, having a skincare routine when you work a night shift, and the best work from home desk set-up.


Activity of the Week: What’s bringing you hope? 


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).
